typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	table as string,
	primarykeys as string
}
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	moveFiles: [('Bpost/HR/' + $table + '/'),('Bpost/HR/' + $table + '_archive/')],
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:[('Bpost/HR/' + $table + '/')]) ~> TempParquet
TempParquet alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRowUpsert
AlterRowUpsert sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:(split($primarykeys,',')),
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> UpsertRDBMS
